data.title: Gold surges back above $5,000 as dip buyers charge back in after historic bloodbath
data.description: Gold's recent selloff reflected positioning rather than a deterioration in fundamentals, analysts say.
data.content:
Gold bounced above $5,000 an ounce on Tuesday as investors rushed back into the metal following one of the sharpest selloffs in decades.
Spot gold was trading around $5,072 per troy ounce at 11:10 p… [+2837 chars]

data.title: Darden Restaurants is shutting down the remaining 28 Bahama Breeze locations. Here's the full list.
data.description: Bahama Breeze will permanently close 14 locations by April 5 and convert the other 14 into another Darden-owned restaurant.
data.content:
Bahama Breeze, the Caribbean-themed chain known for its "island escape" fare for suburban diners, is closing or converting its remaining 28 locations.

data.title: PayPal's former president slams the company, says it's lost its 'mojo' and 'ability to compete'
data.description: David Marcus said on X that PayPal was repeating leadership mistakes that had cost the company its edge.

data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Bitcoin-led Crypto rout erases nearly half a trillion in a week
data.description: Bitcoin on Tuesday tumbled to its lowest level since US President Donald Trump won re-election in early November 2024 and ushered in a more crypto-friendly administration
data.content:
Almost half a trillion dollars has been wiped off cryptocurrencies in less than a week as a selloff led by Bitcoin accelerated.
Total crypto market value has slumped by $467.6 billion since Jan. 29,… [+1777 chars]

data.title: Chipotle is targeting the top of the K-shaped economy
data.description: Chipotle plans to raise prices this year, but executives said on Tuesday that their core consumer, who makes over $100k, probably won't mind.
